name: Sayre — Blob Tower Demo
description:
New in this version: Enemies have been updated a lot, including two new enemy types, and reducing the health of the enemies. Some enemies can drop a heart-shaped butterfly, which will restore all of your health.

How many floors can you clear? How many gems can you collect? You can throw the gems to kill the enemies in one hit.

Game Controls:
Arrow keys (D-Pad): Move
X key (A button): Use item in right hand
Z key (B button): Use item in left hand

Other Controls:
F10, Escape, Pause: Pause game
- (minus) key: Lower volume
= (equals) key: Raise volume
0 key: Mute volume

Download and install instructions for Itch App users:
This game is made using version 11.1.0 of LÖVE. The Windows 32-bit and 64-bit exe's already include everything you need, but you can also download the ".love" file and play on Windows, Mac, Linux, (or other platforms with a keyboard) but you'll have to download LÖVE 11.1.0 from their website: https://love2d.org/
